chapters.title: Chapter 9:  Tangles
chapters.info: Jondyn Barran, p. 203 (222)—Grizzled old man from the Two Rivers. He is a better bowshot than anyone in the Two Rivers except Tam al'Thor and possibly Abell Cauthon, and he is the best hunter bar none. He always says what he thinks, regardless of who hears. He is now traveling with Perrin.
